intro: Don’t let your treasure leave the dome. Merge it together, and create the biggest fortune!
description:
Get ready for a treasure-filled adventure beneath the waves! Merge coins and gems to uncover riches beyond imagination!

Discover maps that change how you play, each with its own unique shape and background. Can you master them all and merge the biggest treasure?

CO-OP mode
Play together locally inside one dome and collect points as a team! Merge treasures, grab power-ups, and try to reach the highest score side by side.

VERSUS mode
Challenge a friend locally! The dome is split in half - one side for you, one side for your opponent. If one player overfills their dome and items spill out, the other has only a few seconds left to score as many points as possible before the game ends!

Catch amazing power-ups as they float to the surface and use them whenever you want:
- Bomb: Explodes and pushes everything away
- Pearl: Merges with any treasure
- Ruby Curse: Makes treasure even more valuable
- Eruption: Destroys all stones
- Specter: Lets your treasure pass through obstacles

Features:
• Online leaderboards to show off your score!
• Co-op mode to play and merge together!
• Versus mode to challenge your friends!
• 2 maps with unique shapes!
• 5 exciting power-ups that can change everything!
• Fully customizable name and character
• Wide range of character skins: from underwater to out of this world!
• A bright and dazzling underwater look!

Swim to the top and rule the leaderboard!
